data.name: Sexy Battle Girls
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Director Mototsugu Watanabe’s SEXY BATTLE GIRLS is a hilarious Pink parody of the classic Japanese TV show, YO-YO GIRL COP (Sukeban Deka), that dishes out a can of whoop-ass you that you won’t want to miss! Mirai gets transferred to a private all-girl’s school where she soon discovers it not only educates girls, it also pimps them out to horny politicians! After learning that the evil headmaster is an insatiable pervert who is responsible for ripping apart her family, Mirai undergoes special training to take down the headmaster and close the school, once and for all.

Mirai gets transferred to a private all-girl’s school where she soon discovers it not only educates girls, it also pimps them out to horny politicians! After learning that the evil headmaster is an insatiable pervert who is responsible for ripping apart her family, Mirai undergoes special training to take down the headmaster and close the school, once and for all.
data.short_description: SEXY BATTLE GIRLS is a hilarious Pink parody of the classic Japanese TV show, YO-YO GIRL COP!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: Contains mature language, simulated adult situations and graphic nudity. This film is for discerning adults of legal age only. Not suitable for minors. Viewer discretion is advised. Please check your country's local laws before purchasing or renting this film.
